summary:
Lightning McQueen is a famous car character from Disney/Pixar's *Cars* movies. He's a red stock car with a lightning bolt design, voiced by Owen Wilson. In the first *Cars* film, Lightning learns about friendship when he gets stranded in a small town. He becomes a successful racer and appears in *Cars 2* and *Cars 3*, where he mentors a new character.

Lightning is popular and has his own toys. Even real-life racing drivers and sports commentators talk about him! Many people think he's one of the coolest car characters in movies.
title: Lightning McQueen
